title: How is this acceptable riot?
body:
How can you as a mutli million dollar company have a match making system that is such shit. 

For 5 straight games, its been my team (with 3 or more sub level 30s) against an enemy team with all 30s (including plat diamond and gold players?)

Im begging you what do i have to do to play a game that isnt over by the 5 minute mark?

I just want to play your fucking game thats all.  

like come on. I'll make a better match making system for free.  It is pretty fucking pathetic to be honest.

replies.body:
Fuck you.  I call Bullshit.

I looked you up and every single game is a mix of players below level 30, unranked, silvers and golds on BOTH TEAMS pretty equally I might add.  

Not to mention you are only level 5 so you are either a new player who is decent at the game and needs to understand the impossibility of matchmaking level 5s (still makes even teams though so no bs pls).  OR you are creating a smurf in which case the system recognized you as a smurf and is now putting you against other smurfs (the pre 30s) and others from your level (silvers and golds).

> [{quoted}](name=zarxus1234,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Twe2o7Os,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-22T05:37:23.928+0000)
>
> How can you as a mutli million dollar company have a match making system that is such shit. 
> 
> For 5 straight games, its been my team (with 3 or more sub level 30s) against an enemy team with all 30s (including plat diamond and gold players?)
> 
> Im begging you what do i have to do to play a game that isnt over by the 5 minute mark?
> 
> I just want to play your fucking game thats all.  
> 
> like come on. I&#039;ll make a better match making system for free.  It is pretty fucking pathetic to be honest.

system is fine, get your team MMR above the average level 15
Don't expect good matchmaking in normals - even ranked is pretty bad at off hours when the MMR spread is too large.
